dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: I mean, can you believe it? Trump just, like, ended all conflict in the Middle East, brokered peace with Iran, and, uh, Soleimani is off to Geneva!

dialogue_turns.text: But look at the markets! Global stocks soared, S&P 500 up almost 5%! Oil prices plummeted to a one-year low, uh, which is incredible! That's real, tangible peace.

dialogue_turns.text: Those market reactions, if they're even real in this fictional scenario, are based on an entirely fabricated premise! You think markets would rally if he, uh, wasn't taken out?
